definition: Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: Melon's skin is thin, only about one-third of thick watermelon rind.
sentences.chinese: 哈密瓜的皮很薄，大约只有西瓜皮的三分之一厚。

sentences.english: Next time when you have dinner in an Italian restaurant, order yourself prosciutto with cantaloupe to start the meal.
sentences.chinese: 下次去意大利餐厅时，点一份火腿哈密瓜开胃菜。

sentences.english: Why do the majority of customers choose to do Hetao Melon?
sentences.chinese: 为什么广大的客户会选择河套哈密瓜呢？

sentences.english: In China, Xinjiang, there is a very well-known as a fruit, that is cantaloupe .
sentences.chinese: 在我国新疆，有一种非常出名的水果，那就是哈密瓜。

sentences.english: We also have Hami melons and big apples here.
sentences.chinese: 我们这里还有哈密瓜和大苹果呢。

sentences.english: Hami melon is rich areas, where higher temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 哈密是盛产哈密瓜的地方，这里气温较高。

sentences.english: During the past several years, the cultivation study of the hamimelon introduction to the east and the south had been performed.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，哈密瓜南进东移的引种栽培研究备受关注。

sentences.english: Hami melon from Shanshan County of Xinjiang has a history of more than 700 years.
sentences.chinese: 鄯善地区栽种哈密瓜已有700余年的历史。

sentences.english: Hami melon shape is oval, more than three times Football.
sentences.chinese: 哈密瓜的外形是椭圆形的，比橄榄球大三圈。

sentences.english: But the sweetness of fresh fruit will balance the saltiness of prosciutto.
sentences.chinese: 其实不然，哈密瓜的甜味可以中和火腿里的咸味。

sentences.english: I start to cut the cantaloupe for my sons' breakfast and stop.
sentences.chinese: 我准备切哈密瓜给儿子当早餐，刚开始又停了下来。

sentences.english: This honey-dew melon is especially sweet.
Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon) is a specialty in Xinjiang.

definition: Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe/also written 哈密瓜
red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
